scripts.dev:static: cmd /C "mklink /J build src\static & mklink /J build\highlight.js node_modules\highlight.js & mklink /J build\mathlive node_modules\mathlive"
scripts.dev:css: bun lightningcss --bundle src/css/index.css -o build/index.css && bun onchange src/css/*.css -- lightningcss --bundle src/css/index.css -o build/index.css
scripts.build: run-s clean:build bundle build:scripts build:hydration-worker build:css
scripts.build:scripts: export UCLEARN_DEBUG=0 UCLEARN_DEBUG_FLAGS= && bun build --outfile=dist/index.js src/index.ts --drop=DOMInspector --drop=console --env "UCLEARN_*" --minify
scripts.bundle: mkdir dist && cp -R src/static/* dist && cp -R node_modules/mathlive/ dist && cp -R node_modules/highlight.js/ dist
scripts.clean:dev: (rm -f src/static/index.js src/static/hydration-worker.js src/static/index.css || true) && cmd /C "rd src\static\mathlive & rd src\static\highlight.js & rd build" || true
